meanings.definition: Inlaid work made from small pieces of variously colored wood or other materials
meanings.sent1: The marquetries on the table were beautifully crafted with different colored wood pieces.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate marquetries on the jewelry box.
meanings.sent3: The marquetries on the floor seemed to dance whenever someone walked by.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a mosaic of marquetries, each memory a different colored piece.
meanings.sent5: The marquetries on the wall glowed in the sunlight, creating a mesmerizing effect.

meanings.definition: The art or craft of making such inlaid work
meanings.sent1: Her passion for marquetries led her to study the art form in depth.
meanings.sent2: The master craftsman taught his apprentice the intricate techniques of marquetries.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best marquetries in town was fierce but friendly.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, marquetries transformed from pieces of wood into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a collection of marquetries from different cultures around the world.
